lines.text: If this turns into a murder investigation, I can let you have another six men.

[Upset]
And what are they supposed to be - pall bearers?
You don't approve of women who take their careers seriously?
Not if it makes 'em selfish. I don't approve of anyone who makes a career a fetish.
What is it with you people? You see a single mother, and as far as you're concerned, we're all screwed up and useless. We're disaster areas!

[to Tennison]
Your finger is on a trigger. This kind of emotional stress could drive him back to established behavior.

[On a taped interview]
There's no trust like a child's. It's a perfect, perfect thing.
